text: Gerhard Aßmus (born 25 September 1928) is a German former sports shooter. He competed in the trap event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Possibly living people Category:People from Brandis, Germany Category:German male sport shooters Category:Sportspeople from Saxony Category:Olympic shooters of the United Team of Germany Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics
title: Gerhard Aßmus
